Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class LessCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessCompiler
  • public class LessCompiler
extends Object

    Less compiler compatible with Less 1.7.5.

    This class is a facade for the NativeLessCompiler. List of methods with a developer-friendly API:

    • compile(File) - compiles a Less source file to a CSS code
    • compile(String) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a CSS code
    • compile(File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file to a CSS code using custom encoding
    • compile(String, Charset) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a CSS code using custom encoding
    • compile(File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration options to a CSS code
    • compile(String, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration options to a CSS code
    • compile(File, File) - compiles a Less source file to a CSS code and saves it in an output file
    • compile(String, File) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a CSS code and saves it in an output file
    • compile(File, File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file to a CSS code and saves it in an output file using custom encoding
    • compile(String, File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a CSS code and saves it in an output file using custom encoding
    • compile(File, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration options and saves result in an output file
    • compile(String, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration options and saves result in an output file
    • compileAndCompress(File) - compiles a Less source file to a compressed CSS code
    • compileAndCompress(String) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a compressed CSS code
    • compileAndCompress(File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file to a compressed CSS code using custom encoding
    • compileAndCompress(String, Charset) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a compressed CSS code using custom encoding
    • compileAndCompress(File, File) - compiles a Less source file to a compressed CSS code and saves it in an output file
    • compileAndCompress(String, File) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a compressed CSS code and saves it in an output file
    • compileAndCompress(File, File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file to a compressed CSS code and saves it in an output file using custom encoding
    • compileAndCompress(String, File, Charset) - compiles a Less source file specified by path to a compressed CSS code and saves it in an output file using custom encoding
    • compileCode(CharSequence) - compiles a Less source code to a CSS code
    • compileCode(CharSequence, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source code with custom configuration options to a CSS code
    • compileCodeAndCompress(CharSequence) - compiles a Less source code to a compressed CSS code
    • compileCodeWithInlineSourceMap(CharSequence, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source code with custom configuration options to a CSS code with an inline Source Map
    • compileWithInlineSourceMap(File, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration to a CSS code with an inline Source Map and saves it in an output file
    • compileWithInlineSourceMap(String, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration to a CSS code with an inline Source Map and saves it in an output file
    • compileWithInlineSourceMap(File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration options to a CSS code with an inline Source Map
    • compileWithInlineSourceMap(String, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration options to a CSS code with an inline Source Map
    • compileWithSourceMap(File, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map (Source Map file name is equal to the output file name with map extension)
    • compileWithSourceMap(String, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map (Source Map file name is equal to the output file name with map extension)
    • compileWithSourceMap(File, File, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map
    • compileWithSourceMap(String, File, File, LessOptions) - compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map

    Example code: 

     String cssCode = null;
 LessOptions options = null;
 
 // create compiler
 LessCompiler compiler = new LessCompiler();
 
 // compile source code
 cssCode = compiler.compileCode(".basic { display: block; }");
  
 // compile source code with custom options
 options = new LessOptionsBuilder().ieCompatibilityOff().build();
 cssCode = compiler.compileCode(".basic { display: block; }", options);
 
 // compile source file specified by path
 cssCode = compiler.compile("http://www.example.org/style.less");
 
 // compile source file
 cssCode = compiler.compile(new File("source.less"));
 
 // compile source file specified by path and save CSS code in an output file
 compiler.compile("http://www.example.org/style.less", new File("output.css"));
 
 // compile source file and save CSS code in an output file
 compiler.compile(new File("source.less"), new File("output.css"));
 
 // compile source file and compress CSS code
 cssCode = compiler.compileAndCompress(new File("source.less"));

 // compile source file specified by path and compress CSS code using custom encoding
 cssCode = compiler.compileAndCompress("http://www.example.org/style.less", Charset.forName("UTF-8"));
  
 // compile source code and generate inline source map
 cssCode = compiler.compileCodeWithInlineSourceMap(".basic { display: block; }", new LessOptions());
 
 // compile source file and generate source map (save it in output.map file)
 options = new LessOptionsBuilder().sourceMapBasePath("basePath").build();
 compiler.compileWithSourceMap(new File("source.less"), new File("output.css"), new File("output.map"), options);
 
 // compile source file and generate source map (save it in output.css.map file)
 compiler.compileWithSourceMap(new File("source.less"), new File("output.css"), options);
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    LessOptionsBuilder

      • compileCode

        public String compileCode​(CharSequence code)
        Compiles a Less source code to a CSS code.
        Parameters:
        code - the Less code (cannot be null).
        Returns:
        the CSS code.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the Less code is null.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

                               File output,

        Since:
        2.0.0

      • compileAndCompress

        public void compileAndCompress​(File input,
                               File output,
                               Charset encoding)
        Compiles a Less source file to a compressed CSS code and saves it in an output file using custom encoding.
        Parameters:
        input - the source file (cannot be null and must exist).
        output - the output file (cannot be null).
        encoding - the encoding used to read the source file and write the output file (cannot be null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if the compiler cannot read source file or any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • compileCodeWithInlineSourceMap

        public String compileCodeWithInlineSourceMap​(CharSequence code,
                                             LessOptions options)
        Compiles a Less source code with custom configuration options to a CSS code with an inline Source Map.
        Parameters:
        code - the Less code (cannot be null).
        options - the configuration options (can be null).
        Returns:
        the CSS code with inline Source Map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • compileWithSourceMap

        public void compileWithSourceMap​(String input,
                                 File output,
                                 LessOptions options)
        Compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map. The CSS code will be saved in an output file and the Source Map in a file with name equal to the output file name with map extension.
        Parameters:
        input - the source file specified by path (cannot be null).
        output - the output file (cannot be null).
        options - the configuration options (can be null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if the compiler cannot read source file or any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

                                 File output,
                                 LessOptions options)

      • compileWithSourceMap

        public void compileWithSourceMap​(String input,
                                 File output,
                                 File outputSourceMap,
                                 LessOptions options)
        Compiles a Less source file specified by path with custom configuration to a CSS code with a Source Map. The CSS code will be saved in an output file and the Source Map in an output Source Map file.
        Parameters:
        input - the source file specified by path (cannot be null).
        output - the output file (cannot be null).
        outputSourceMap - the output file for Source Map (cannot be null).
        options - the configuration options (can be null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if the compiler cannot read source file or any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0
